text: evarum tankal kulantaikalai(c cantekamara) arivataippola, vetam kotukkap pattavarkal (nam tutarakiya) ivarai (ivar iraivanutaiya tutartan enru) nankarivarkal. (Eninum, avarkalil) evarkal (itai maraittu) tankalukkut tame nastamilaittuk kontanaro avarkaltan (nam tutarakiya ivarai iraivanutaiya tutarenru) nampamattarkal
